Brain Rot Extension - Seamless Brain Rot Content At The Tips of Your Fingers

Ever had to read lecture notes, and desired nothing more than to watch Brain Rot at the same time?
We've got the extension for you.

Key Features

With Brain Rot, you can instantly access a curated collection of Subway Surfers and Minecraft-themed YouTube videos. Each click on the Subway Surfers or Minecraft tabs randomly selects a new video from a dedicated playlist, ensuring fresh and entertaining content every time.
High-quality videos stream in an embedded YouTube player, which is automatically muted and plays in a clutter-free, distraction-free mode with autoplay for uninterrupted viewing.

Why Brain Rot? Brain Rot’s streamlined interface is designed for quick access and effortless control over video content. You can seamlessly switch between Brain Rot sources. Without leaving your current page. Each feature is carefully crafted to provide an immersive video experience that’s simple to navigate and enjoyable to use.

Convenient Access: No need to open new tabs or perform multiple steps to find and play your favorite content. Just a click, and your video starts playing.
Automatic Refresh: Every time you click a tab, Brain Rot brings in fresh, random videos from a curated selection, ensuring your viewing experience is always unique.
Perfect for Multitaskers: The extension’s pop-up design keeps your videos within reach without disrupting your main browsing activity.
How It Works
Subway Surfers & Minecraft Video Streaming:

Click on the “Subway Surfers” or “Minecraft” tab to instantly play a random YouTube video from carefully selected playlists. Watch as your favorite characters and adventures come to life on your screen.

Use simple navigation tools within the extension to pause, close, or select new videos. Each media player adapts to your interaction, keeping controls intuitive and easy to use.
Security & Privacy
Your security and privacy are essential to Brain Rot. The extension requests only the permissions necessary to fetch and display your media content. 

User Experience and Customization
Minimalistic Design: Brain Rot’s interface is sleek, distraction-free, and easy to navigate.
Quick Video Access: Instantly watch Subway Surfers or Minecraft videos without browsing external sites.
Seamless Integration with Chrome: The extension appears as a pop-up window, accessible from your Chrome toolbar for easy multitasking.
Ideal For
Fans of Subway Surfers and Minecraft looking for curated video content that’s fresh, varied, and accessible on-demand.
Chrome Users who value a unified, hassle-free video experience without the need to switch tabs or load additional windows.
Download Brain Rot Extension today and bring your favorite video content directly to your Chrome browser—enjoy instant entertainment, effortlessly.
